home.hero.subtitle: Decentralized car rental on Ethereum. List your car, rent with full transparency, no middleman.
home.feature.p2p.title: Peer-to-peer
home.feature.p2p.desc: Direct payments to the owner via smart contract. No third party.
home.feature.traceable.title: Traceable
home.feature.traceable.desc: Verifiable transactions on the Ethereum blockchain (Sepolia).
home.feature.secure.title: Secure
home.feature.secure.desc: Security deposit, reentrancy protection and OpenZeppelin controls.

browse.empty.title: No cars
